use nyc_taxi_ldw
GO

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS bronze.vw_rate_code
GO

CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_rate_code 
AS 
select rate_code_id,rate_code
    from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'rate_code.json',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_src',
        FORMAT='CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR='0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR='0x0b')
        with  
            (
            jsondata NVARCHAR(Max) 
            ) as rate_data
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsondata)
        with(
            rate_code_id SMALLINT,
            rate_code VARCHAR(25)
            )
GO


DROP VIEW IF EXISTS bronze.vw_payment_type
GO

CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_payment_type 
AS 
select payment_type,payment_type_desc
    from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_src',
        FORMAT='CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR='0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE='0x0b')
        with  
            (
                jsondata NVARCHAR(Max) 
            ) as payment_type
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsondata)
        with
        (
            payment_type SMALLINT,
            payment_type_desc VARCHAR(25)
        ) as payment_type_detail

GO


DROP VIEW IF EXISTS bronze.vw_trip_data_green
GO

CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_trip_data_green
AS
SELECT CAST(result_trip_green.filepath(1) AS VARCHAR(4)) AS year, 
    CAST(result_trip_green.filepath(2) AS VARCHAR(2)) AS month,
result_trip_green.*
  FROM
    OPENROWSET
            (
                BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
                DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_src',
                FORMAT='CSV',
                PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
                HEADER_ROW=TRUE
            ) 
    WITH    
        (
            VendorID bigint,
            lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(0),
            lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(0),
            store_and_fwd_flag varchar(1),
            RatecodeID bigint,
            PULocationID bigint,
            DOLocationID bigint,
            passenger_count bigint,
            trip_distance float,
            fare_amount float,
            extra float,
            mta_tax float,
            tip_amount float,
            tolls_amount float,
            ehail_fee float,
            improvement_surcharge float,
            total_amount float,
            payment_type bigint,
            trip_type bigint,
            congestion_surcharge float
        ) AS result_trip_green

select * from bronze.vw_rate_code

SELECT * from bronze.vw_payment_type 

select * from bronze.vw_trip_data_green
where year='2020'
and month='02'
